meaningMnemonic: The kanji means <kanji>attain</kanji> but the meaning of this verb is <vocabulary>to arrive at</vocabulary>. I suppose that's because if you attain something like enlightenment, you also arrive at that enlightenment as well. Thus, <vocabulary>to arrive at</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: What’s the key <vocabulary>to arrive at</vocabulary> enlightenment? Being an avid <reading>eater</reading> (いた)! Being an eater of all things delicious will truly let your body and mind arrive at new levels. Give it a shot. Become an eater.
